abstract: Citigroup has found a way to make its financial results sound much better than they are. It is treating as “non-core” everything it did badly.
snippet: Citigroup has found a way to make its financial results sound much better than they are. It is treating as “non-core” everything it did badly.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup released its newly massaged financial statements today. They make the company’s “core” businesses look pretty good, which of course, is the objective.
